npc.speach: You feel tired; like you have woken up from a bad dream. The loud pounding on the door doesn't help either. You open the door and Lucius, the Head of the Guard, is there, looking furious as always.

npc.name: MC
npc.speach: You'd be sleeping too if you had the graveyard shift all week. Why? What happened?

npc.name: Lucius
npc.speach: Well, while you were sleeping, someone killed the Keeper.

npc.name: Lucius
npc.speach: You heard me. Now come with me or I'll drag you out.
You decide that it's not worth arguing with Lucius when he's like this. You would like to keep as many of your limbs as possible.

npc.name: Lucius
npc.speach: The magistriate is waiting for your arrival. Get going.
